text: Lee J. Cobb (December 8, 1911February 11, 1976) was an American actor.Obituary Variety, February 18, 1976. He was best known for his roles in 12 Angry Men, On the Waterfront, and The Exorcist. Cobb was born in The Bronx, New York. His daughter, Julie Cobb, was also an actress. Cobb died in Woodland Hills, California from a heart attack, aged 64. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1911 births Category:1976 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:People from the Bronx
title: Lee J. Cobb
